external_games.name: Adventure Quiz: Capcom World: Hatena no Daibouken
Adventure Quiz: Capcom World - Hatena no Daibouken

name: Adventure Quiz: Capcom World - Hatena no Daibouken
summary: A PC Engine CD-ROM compilation of the first two Arcade games in the Adventure Quiz/Capcom World series. The player answers questions about Capcom games to further a story.
